H0.text: Frog is an animal that also sheds its outer covering as it grows larger, just as small grasshoppers do.

H1.text: Snake is an animal that sheds its outer covering as it grows larger, just like small grasshoppers.

H2.text: Fish shed their outer covering as they grow larger, just as small grasshoppers do.

H3.text: Human also sheds its outer covering as it grows larger, just like small grasshoppers do.

A4.text: Snakes shed the complete outer layer of skin in one piece.
